txt.en: 'It is intolerable! My people have been all but destroyed by the Orcs, and now we must resort to burning their bodies to prevent their defilement! Let the Orcs burn as well, then....\n\n'Will you join us as we take our revenge upon the Orcs? Together, we will drive them forth from Thornhope and into ruin!'
'There are too many Orcs to disperse with but one attack, but I will not rest until the remainder have been slain or driven off!\n\n'You have my thanks for your assistance.'
The need to burn the bodies of the fallen within Thornhope was the final straw for Thane Béortnoth.
You have helped Thane Béortnoth take revenge on the Orcs
Thane Béortnoth is camped outside Thornhope.\n\nYou should speak with Thane Béortnoth when you are prepared to assault the Orcs at Thornhope.
Thane Béortnoth is encamped outside Thornhope.\n\nYou should speak with Béortnoth about the assault against the Orcs.
